item.description:
I am hoping that we will have dug out of the snow and hiberation by the time this event comes around. Thought it would be nice to get into New Haven and enjoy our local museum. Lets explore the collection there and maybe enjoy coffee at a local shop on Chapel Street or Frozen Yogart at FroYo World -chapel/high street, (If we are not frozen ourselves).

Admission is FREE

Parking
In addition to the metered spaces (FREE ON SUNDAY) on nearby streets, there is a conveniently located garage at 150 York Street, which offers discount parking to Members of the Yale Art Museums.
item.how_to_find_us: meet in the front lobby, will wear the bw scarf with piano keys
item.name: A Day at the Museum
